name: Xeno Tezors #03 - Corvi L54
description: It might have been a malfunction in his programming which made Corvi L54 think it would be a good idea to upgrade himself with a human heart. Once the upgrade was completed successfully he was hunted by his creators. They wanted to understand this new species and make experiments on him.  So Corvi L54 fled to the darkest corners of the universe where he made friendship to Balantosis. His android mind knows that Balantosis is the biggest menace to all lifeforms and enemy to the world  he once loved to exist in but his human heart made him feel so lonely during his journey that he is just happy to have found someone who does not want to make experiments on him. Now he finally knows the reason for unlogical human behaviour.
